eng_after: of the one afflicted with a skin disease
of him who has a discharge,

eng_before: He is to have the woman
He built it according to what is written
when He puts you in command
along with his deeds of loving devotion

eng_after: so that the people could understand
and they spent another quarter of the day
I will bring it about quickly.

eng_before: Then you are to answer them:

eng_after: and they must keep My Sabbaths
